channel.title: Cammypvp source help with making non wild spot!
channel.description: Hello I need help with my 317 Cammy pvp source from "Z bow D0wn" his source. The seers village bank is a safe spot originally, and I want to make a new safe spot. I took the coords of NonWildPvP() and put them in for my spot that i wanted. I started from SW corner and ended in NW ive read the guides on how to do it. When i compiled and reran server nothing happened, please help. THANKS =D BEST DETAIL WOULD BE NICE!

item.title: Cammypvp source help with making non wild spot!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

public boolean isPlayerInWild() {
    if(/*All the coordinates for the wild*/) {
        return true;
   } else if (/*Coordinates for the non-wild area*/) {
        return false;
    }

I suggest you read up on some things:
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/if.html

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/Boolean.html

Read full topic

item.title: Cammypvp source help with making non wild spot!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Learn how to use if statements. I’m sure like most bases, this one uses a boolean to detect the wild areas, just in the boolean, insert an if statement to return false if the player is in that area.

Read full topic

item.title: Cammypvp source help with making non wild spot!

@owwch_u_died wrote:

Hello
I need help with my 317 Cammy pvp source from “Z bow D0wn” his source.
The seers village bank is a safe spot originally, and I want to make a new safe spot.
I took the coords of NonWildPvP() and put them in for my spot that i wanted.
I started from SW corner and ended in NW ive read the guides on how to do it.
When i compiled and reran server nothing happened, please help. THANKS =D BEST DETAIL WOULD BE NICE!
